Text.Page:
The Hatchery is littered with the mummified bodies of our fallen soldiers. It's a pity that we've just left them here to rotâ€”but no more!

Recover what bodies you can and bring them here.

Returning them to their families won't do the dead much good, but perhaps it'll ease the pain of those at home.

Thanks for your help.
Help me do the right thing, <PCNAME>. Bring back our honored dead.
